last_episode_to_air.name: The Wedding
last_episode_to_air.overview: The wedding day is finally here. They are getting married at a castle in the countryside – all Leslie has to do is get there on time, in one piece and not ruin anything.

name: Mister Winner
overview: Leslie Winner is an eternally-optimistic klutz with his heart in the right place. Somehow, despite his calamitous nature, he has found love with his fiancé Jemma and they are preparing for their wedding. The pressure is on Leslie to find, and keep a job, pay for the honeymoon and keep his father-in-law happy, his mum and her new boyfriend happy and hang on to Jemma long enough to walk up the aisle together. Will Leslie be a winner or will his surname continue to be ironic?

episodes.name: The Piano
episodes.overview: Leslie finds a piano while on a house clearance. When it turns out to be self-playing, he takes a job as a pianist in a restaurant and quickly finds himself in over his head.

episodes.name: The Decorating Job
episodes.overview: When one of Chris’ painters calls in sick, he reluctantly agrees to let Leslie take on a decorating job for an elderly client.

episodes.name: The Interview
episodes.overview: Leslie is not looking forward to his mum’s birthday lunch. Her new boyfriend Steve is only a year older than Leslie, and is particularly fond of public displays of affection.

episodes.name: The Package
episodes.overview: Jemma is away on a business trip, and Leslie is off to a Doctor Who convention. But Jemma calls and asks Leslie to wait in for a package - well, he did say he had no plans.

episodes.name: The Stag Do
episodes.overview: It is Leslie’s stag do, and the gang are off kayaking. But when Leslie suggests a short cut, things literally take an unexpected turn.

episodes.name: The Wedding
episodes.overview: The wedding day is finally here. They are getting married at a castle in the countryside – all Leslie has to do is get there on time, in one piece and not ruin anything.
